subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: About 1,100 fans of the old Nordiques attended Islanders game against the Atlanta Thrashers, an effort to show that a revived Nordiques club could be a draw.
snippet: About 1,100 fans of the old Nordiques attended Islanders game against the Atlanta Thrashers, an effort to show that a revived Nordiques club could be a draw.
